name: Concealed Weapon
description: Slash an enemy, dealing 2323 Magic Damage.   Attacking with Concealed Weapon from the flank stuns the enemy for 3 seconds and sets them Off Balance.  While slotted, your Movement Speed while Sneaking or invisible is increased by 25%.
effectLines: While slotted, your Movement Speed while Sneaking or invisible is increased.
coefDescription: Slash an enemy, dealing $1 Magic Damage.   Attacking with Concealed Weapon from the flank stuns the enemy for 3 seconds and sets them Off Balance.  While slotted, your Movement Speed while Sneaking or invisible is increased by 25%.
